name: Medical & Surgical
description: We have the most comprehensive medical services in the state, with expert care covering a wide range of illnesses plus emergency and elective surgery, ensuring our community receives the care they need.

name: Aged care
description: We lead the way in aged care, providing specialised medical care for people over 65 years for issues including dementia, falls, continence problems and rheumatology.

name: Rehabilitation
description: We are a statewide provider of rehabilitation services, helping people after accident or illness to regain function, independence and wellbeing.

name: Diagnosis & investigation
description: Diagnosing medical issues early is crucial. Whatever your condition, we can diagnose it using a range of technologies and pathologies.

name: Specialised support services
description: Your care will be multi-disciplinary to ensure you can return to your daily activities as soon as possible.

name: Mental health
description: We provide a range of specialised mental health services for people of all ages in our community.
